subject: Call os.kill for each child instead of the process group

values.-1: This patch needs further work before it can be merged
values.+1: Looks good to me, but someone else must approve

messages.message: Uploaded patch set 2.

Patch Set 2:

If glance is acting as a monitor for child processes,
perhaps it would be better to ensure glance is in it's own program group by calling os.setpgrp() at startup.
Otherwise offspring of children may not be killed

Patch Set 2: I would prefer that you didn't merge this

(1 inline comment)

Comment in line.  I wonder if there is way to test for this situation.

Patch Set 2: (1 inline comment)

my bad!

Will try to come out with some test for this!

Cheers!

Cheers,
Eoghan
